void rtc_valid (  ) 

Wait until data in rtc is valid. Data is valid until +/- 240 usec after this function returns, thus a read/write can be done to the RTC within this time period

void rtc_write_alarm ( RTC_TIME *  alarmtime  ) 

Write alarm to RTC

Uses write_rtcv() and dec2bcd()
